√bhū 'be'

present: [1.] bhávati etc. V.+  bhávate etc. B.+  

perfect: babhū́va etc. V.+  babhū́tha  babhū́vitha  babhūyās  babhūyā́t  babhūtu  

aorist: [1.] ábhūt  ábhūvan etc. V.+  bhūyā́sam  bhūyā́sma etc. V.+  bhūyāma  bodhí  bhū́tu etc.  abhāvi   -- ábhuvat etc.  bhúvat etc.  bhuvāni   -- [3.] abūbhuvas  abībhavat   -- [5.] bhaviṣāt?  abhaviṣṭa  bhaviṣīṣṭa  

future: [1.] bhaviṣyáti etc. V.+  bhaviṣyáte etc. E.+  abhaviṣyat etc. U.+  bhaviṣyadhvam   -- [2.] bhavitā́  

verbal: bhūtá V.+  bhávitum B.+  bhávitos  bhūtvā́ V.+  bhūtvī́  -bhū́ya V.+  bhuvé  -bhúve  -bhvè  bhūṣáṇi  -bhū́yam  -bhávam  

secondary: passive: bhūyate etc. E.+  bhūyati   -- intensive: bóbhavīti etc. V.+   -- desiderative: búbhūṣati etc. V.+  búbhūṣate etc. E.+   -- causative: bhāvayati etc. AV.+  bhāvayate  bhāvitum  bhāvyate etc. E.+  bibhāvayiṣati  

derivatives: bhū́ V.+  -bhu V.+  -bhva V.  bhúva B.+  bhava V.+  bhavá AV.+  bhavaka C.  -bhavin C.  bhávya V.+  -bhvan V.  bhavana E.+  bhavanīya C.  bhúvana V.+  -bhavas B.  bhúvas B.+  bhū́ti V.+  bhūtí RV.  bhávītva RV.  bhavitavyà B.+  bhavitṛ E.+  bhavítra V.  bhū́man V.S.  bhūmán V.+  bhū́mi V.+  bhū́mī V.+  bhū́yas V.+  bhávīyas RV.  bhū́yiṣṭha V.+  -bhaviṣṭha RV.  bhū́ri V.+  -bhū́varī V.B.  bhūṣṇu B.+  bhaviṣṇú B.+  -bhū́ya AV.+  bhāva U.S.+  bhāvaka E.+  bhāvin E.+  bhāvyá V.+  bhāvana E.+  bhāvanīya E.+  bhā́vuka B.+  bubhūṣā B.+  bubhūṣaka E.  bubhuṣitavya JB.  bubhūṣu S.+  bhāvayitavya B.+  bhāvayitṛ B.+  bhāvayú RV.
